GSD.description:
cifs: fix double free race when mount fails in cifs_get_root()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.305 by commit da834d6c1147c7519a9e55b510a03b7055104749. For more details please see the references link.
